job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-oplossingen gebaseerd op large language models (LLM's).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of designing and implementing AI solutions using LLMs, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Verbeteren van de kwaliteit en nauwkeurigheid van tekstmodellen.
job_tasks.justification: Improving the quality and accuracy of text models is a direct aspect of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyseren en voorbereiden van datasets voor optimale modelprestaties.
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing and preparing datasets is a crucial step in data engineering, ensuring data is suitable for model training.

job_tasks.phrase: Testen, valideren en continu optimaliseren van ontwikkelde oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: Testing, validating, and continuously optimizing solutions points to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining models, fitting within MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: werken aan oplossingen die directe impact hebben op onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, working on solutions with direct customer impact implies building user-facing applications, a key part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je aan een innovatieve toepassing
job_tasks.justification: Developing an 'innovative application' suggests building a software product, which aligns with software development.
Developing and applying AI models within the context of an 'application' implies integration and building software around the models.

soft_skills.phrase: Zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design and implementation of AI solutions based on large language models (LLMs), including improving text models. It also highlights the development of an innovative application with direct customer impact, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building user-facing systems around generative models.
